name: Futility
desc: Very soon the demon of terror will come knocking at the door. It waits in the darkness, setting traps to lead the world to temptation.

name: Love
desc: With a healthy environment and proper care, vibrant new life will be able to sprout.

name: Oppression
desc: Struggling forward along the path, carrying a great weight alone. Even when defeat seems inevitable, there is still hope ahead.

name: Courage
desc: Jumping into the murky depths, no matter what dangers lie beneath the surface. Summon the courage to chase your desires, never faltering.

name: Works
desc: A castle may rise up in your dreams in just one night, but you must gather the stones to build it after you awake.

name: Control
desc: With staff in hand, he protects his steadfast beliefs and demonstrates his own sense of justice.

name: Sorrow
desc: The sharp sword pierced through the still-beating heart. But now the blood is drying, and the wound will heal.

name: Valor
desc: In the midst of the chaos, he raises his weapon. He focuses his mind, defeats the monstrous foes, and raises his voice high.

name: Renewal
desc: When nothing changes, people will soon grow bored... But as the sun rises in the east, new opportunities quietly arrive.

name: Virtue
desc: Receiving God's gracious blessings, happiness and joy create a garden of beautifully blooming flowers.

name: Reconciliation
desc: Whether the future is good or ill, accepting all of your imperfections is the only way to move forward.

name: Peace
desc: A sincere wish that the world will be free from violence and strife, and that peace will finally come.

name: Disappointment
desc: As pain washes over you and you fight to catch your breath, will you be able to ride out the storm?

name: Opulence
desc: Intense desires are finally calmed by the serene beauty all around. Amidst the incredible sense of relief, calamity looms beyond the ramparts.

name: Prosperity
desc: Draped in finery, tension is finally released as we dance to a soft melody in the moonlight.

name: Power
desc: An ever-evolving source of power courses through the body. It invigorates your fearless spirit and creates new life.

name: Transformation
desc: The winds and waves are ever-changing, but they will not consume you if you simply readjust your course.

name: Worry
desc: Drowning in a beautiful dream both day and night, but cruel reality threatens to swallow you up. You must wake up soon.

name: Victory
desc: The laurel-crowned warrior returns in glory. All the pain and suffering of the past is reduced to dust amidst the triumphant cheers.

name: Truth
desc: When the path is lost beneath entangled desires, the light of reason can cut through the fog and dispel the shadows.

name: Defeat
desc: The black current gradually recedes, and light appears on the horizon. Fears and doubts will be lifted with the coming dawn.

name: Pleasure
desc: In a world of fairy tales, there is no sadness, only pure joy and beauty. Savor it while it lasts.

name: Success
desc: Hesitation will only hinder your progress. Listen to your heart, take hold of your fate, and seize victory.

name: Hindrance
desc: The foggy path is choked with vines, and demons whisper to lead travelers astray. When will this curse be lifted?

name: Creation
desc: The lion bathed in intense flames stretches its body. A joyous melody is heard and the light appears.

name: Awareness
desc: The fog is now lifted, and the scenery before our eyes becomes bathed in light. The true world is finally here.

name: Departure
desc: When one can truly understand their own heart and know the place where they belong, they will find what it is they've been looking for.

name: Growth
desc: A seedling sprouts from the soil, and the roots spread out deep. New life grows unfettered.

name: Wisdom
desc: Take your desires in hand and form them into a spear, piercing through the dark clouds that obscure the truth.

name: Meditation
desc: Spread your wings and soar into the sky. Your mind is free from doubts, and you are simply heading toward the end of the journey.

name: Faith
desc: The golden fields are bathed in sunlight. A knight in black armor lifts his weary head and gazes into the distance.

name: Trust
desc: White lotus flowers bloom out of the mud. Seedlings buried too long in the darkness always yearn for the sky.

name: Hope
desc: Shed the old shell of desire and reach out with both hands toward love and new life. Then you can spread your wings toward dreams of tomorrow.

name: Harmony
desc: When the spring arrives, the greenery returns of its own accord. At the end of the journey, the heart will be at peace.

name: Resolve
desc: Over towering mountains and across rushing waters, no obstacle can stand in your way.

name: Perseverance
desc: The sharp blade will never stop swinging. A fearless fighting spirit will cut through any chains that try to bind it.

name: Acceptance
desc: The fierce flames roar and rage, engulfing everything until silence returns and a gentle light shines through.

name: Freedom
desc: She escapes from her prison, her pure white skirt fluttering. Each graceful step brings her toward freedom.

name: Integrity
desc: Rise on the wings of intuition and imagination. The noble steed raises its head, galloping toward dreams and the future, a path enveloped in light and hope.

name: The Self
desc: Your voice echoes alone through the dense fog. Away from the clamor of the world outside, uncover your inner truths, and your heart will come to know its true form.
